scripts.build-all: npm-run-all -p build-html build-html-metatag build-css build-css-grid build-css-performance build-css-guidelines build-js build-js-array build-js-variables build-js-functions build-js-objects build-js-xhr build-js-serviceworker build-js-modules build-php build-php-variables build-php-functions build-php-crud build-vuejs build-vuejs-install build-vuejs-component build-reactjs build-reactjs-install build-reactjs-element build-reactjs-component build-reactjs-props build-reactjs-state build-reactjs-form build-api build-accessibility build-rwd build-git build-webpack build-tdd build-bem build-node build-optimisation build-express build-redux compile-scss
scripts.build-html: mustache -p views/partials/header.mustache -p views/partials/footer.mustache data/archive/html/htmlData.json views/templates/pageTemplate.mustache > dist/pages/new-archive/html.html
